property.name: createFolderQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.folder ( folder_id, folder_name, parent_id, created_date, owner) VALUES ( :FOLDER_ID, :FOLDER_NAME, :PARENT_ID, :CREATED_DATE, :OWNER)

property.name: updateFolderQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.folder SET folder_name = :FOLDER_NAME, parent_id = :PARENT_ID, locked = :LOCKED, owner = :OWNER WHERE folder_id = :FOLDER_ID

property.name: loadFolderByNameAndParentIdQuery
property.value: SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.created_date, f.locked, f.owner FROM pipeline.folder f WHERE lower(f.folder_name) = ? and f.parent_id = ?

property.name: loadFolderByNameQuery

property.name: loadParentFoldersQuery
property.value: WITH RECURSIVE parents AS ( SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.created_date, f.locked, f.owner FROM pipeline.folder AS f WHERE f.folder_id = ? UNION ALL SELECT c.folder_id, c.parent_id, c.folder_name, c.created_date, c.locked, c.owner FROM pipeline.folder AS c JOIN parents ON parents.parent_id = c.folder_id ) SELECT n.folder_id, n.parent_id, n.folder_name, n.created_date, n.locked, n.owner, m.data FROM parents AS n LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM pipeline.metadata AS d WHERE d.entity_class = 'FOLDER') AS m ON n.folder_id = m.entity_id;

property.name: updateFolderLocksQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.folder SET locked = :LOCKED WHERE folder_id IN (:IDS)
